name: Awaiting System Response...
simple_desc: After this unit attacks, there is a chance of implanting the target with 1 random Bug.
desc:
Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: Reduce ATK by #1[f1]%, reduce DEF by #2[f1]%, and reduce SPD by #3[f1]%.
Every time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a #4[i]% base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for #5[i] turn(s) in an enemy target.
